thread.title: Four Locals on NHL's Preliminary Scout List
thread.title_full: Four Locals on NHL's Preliminary Scout List

title: Four Locals on NHL's Preliminary Scout List
text:
Four Locals on NHL's Preliminary Scout List 
By Zach Schneider Four Locals on NHL's Preliminary Scout List October 1, 2015 Updated Oct 1, 2015 at 7:08 PM CDT 
Duluth, MN (NNCNOW.com) --- Four native Northlanders are included on the preliminary watch list put out by the NHL's Central Scouting Service (CSS), which is designed to predict where players will be taken in next year's NHL Entry Draft. 
Grand Rapids, Minn. native Mitchell Mattson joins Duluth, Minn. natives Alex Spencer, Shay Donovan, and Ash Altmann on the watch list, which includes 19 native Minnesotans.
